cards.name: Ser Edmure Tully
cards.text: Reaction: After a character gains power, move 1 power from that character to a House Tully character. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "Tell Father I have gone to make him proud."

cards.name: Bear Island
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal a loyal card, gain 1 gold. (Limit twice per phase.)
cards.flavor: "Bear Island is beautiful, but remote." <cite>Ser Jorah Mormont</cite>

cards.name: Renly Baratheon
cards.text: Insight. Renown. While an opponent controls a King character, Renly Baratheon cannot be saved. Reaction: After you draw a loyal card using insight, reveal it to draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: "He was the king that should have been. He was the best of them." <cite>The Knight of Flowers</cite>

cards.name: Crown of Golden Roses
cards.text: Lord character only. Attached character gains the King trait. Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give attached character +X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of challenge icons attached character has. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Thoren Smallwood
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, gain 1 power for your faction.
cards.flavor: "The Lord Commander's place is at Castle Black, lording and commanding."

cards.name: Night Gathers...
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Choose an opponent whose reserve value is lower than yours. Until the end of the phase, you may marshal characters from that player's discard pile as if they were in your hand.

cards.name: Asshai Priestess
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Asshai Priestess, choose and kneel a character with STR 2 or lower.
cards.flavor: "The Lady Melisandre tells us that sometimes R'hllor permits his faithful servants to glimpse the future in flames." <cite>Ser Axell Florent</cite>

cards.name: Visited by Shadows
cards.text:
Opponent's character only.
Attached character gets -1 STR.
cards.flavor: "The shadows come to dance, my lord, dance my lord, dance my lord..." <cite>Patchface</cite>

cards.name: Ser Amory Lorch
cards.text: While an opponent controls 3 or fewer characters, Ser Amory Lorch gains renown.
cards.flavor: Through the open visor of his helm, a face pale and piggy peered up.

cards.name: Harrenhal
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Harrenhal to put a [lannister] or House Bolton character into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that character is still in play, kill it (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Lordsport Fisherman
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Lordsport Fisherman, add the bottom card of your deck to your hand.
cards.flavor: Beneath the dubious protection of the fish-ridden little castle lay the village of Lordsport, its harbor aswarm with ships.

cards.name: King of Salt and Rock
cards.text: Ironborn character only. Attached character gains the King trait and pillage. Reaction: After an attachment or location is discarded using pillage, attached character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Devoted Bloodrider
cards.text: Each Bloodrider character you control gets +1 STR.
cards.flavor: ...a bloodrider was more than a guard. They were the khal's brothers, his shadows, his fiercest friends.

cards.name: Blood of My Blood
cards.text: Challenges Action: Search your deck for a Bloodrider character and put it into play. Shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.
cards.flavor: "Jhogo was the first to lay his arakh at her feet."

cards.name: Spearmaiden
cards.text: Reaction: After Spearmaiden is declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge, choose a character controlled by the defending player. If you win the challenge by 5 or more STR, that character must be chosen for claim during this challenge, if able.

cards.name: The Scorpion's Sting
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose up to X [martell] characters. Each of those characters gains renown until the end of the phase. X is the number of plot cards in your used pile.

cards.name: Hot Pie
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Kneel a Companion character to reduce the cost of the next unique character you marshal this phase by 1.
cards.flavor: By midday Hot Pie had begun to complain.

cards.name: The God's Eye
cards.text:
The God's Eye cannot be discarded from play.
+1 Income.
+1 Reserve.

cards.name: Dissension
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Choose an Ally character, and discard it from play.
cards.flavor: "I've lost half my men. Horse as well. I'm not taking more into that fire." <cite>The Hound</cite>

cards.name: Battle of Oxcross
cards.text: Each character with printed cost 4 or higher cannot be declared as a defender during the first challenge you initiate this round.
